properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 29 at 11:47PM PST until March 2 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Las Vegas NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected Sunday through Sunday night. Total snow
accumulations of 3 to 7 inches above 5000 feet. Greater
amounts in the higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 40
mph.

* WHERE...Lincoln County.

* WHEN...From 10 AM Sunday to 4 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult due to snow-covered roads
Sunday, particularly along Highway 93, State Route 319 and
State Route 322.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Up to 2 inches of snow is possible along
Highway 93 from near Panaca north to the White Pine County
line. Travel could also be difficult due to snow-covered
roadways along State Route 319, State Route 322 and Atlanta
Road.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SUNDAY TO 4 AM PST MONDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET
